comments.body: how much work would it be to reuse the same setup for scalafmt/scalameta docs? Would we have to copy-paste these components or is there a smarter way to share code?
Docusaurus provides some basic building blocks (https://docusaurus.io/docs/en/api-pages.html#provided-components), the rest we'll have to copy paste.
